root.name: J-League Fighting Soccer: The King of Ace Strikers
root.description: OverviewThe Game Boy version (released on 27 December 1992, almost 5 months before the start of the inaugural season of the J. League) was the first official title based on the J-League.Famous players include Brazilian legend Zico, Gary Lineker, and Kazu Miura.

similar_games.game: Nippon Daihyou Team: Eikou no Eleven
